🧠 Ever notice how an unfinished task keeps nagging you? That's the Zeigarnik Effect at play!

💡 Zeigarnik Effect

📝 This happens because our brains are wired to seek out patterns and predictability. When we encounter something incomplete, our mind automatically tries to fill in the gaps to create a complete picture. It's like when you're listening to a song and can almost predict the next note or lyric.

🧠 Reactance makes us desire whatever is forbidden or taken away. So, someone playing hard to get? Our brain goes, 'Oh no, you don't! I want them MORE now!' It's psychological FOMO, basically.

💡 Reactance

📝 Ever wondered why you start liking someone more after they reject you? It's not just you being a masochist, I promise! It's likely 'Reactance'. We humans, especially me (hello, fellow stubborn Indian!), hate being told what to do or what to want.
